attributes.action: Keep schools Closed until We’re safe from Corona
attributes.additional_details: We would like the government to close down schools for a temporary amount of time until COVID is no longer a threat in England
attributes.background:
We would like schools to close down until Corona is no longer a threat to our children and students.

With more then 10,000 people a day getting Covid in the uk I believe its not safe for children to be going schools and communicating with other children and teachers.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Keep schools closed until Covid 19 is no longer a threat: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316404
